title: user registration with unique email and valid password
description: Test the user registration API to ensure it successfully registers a new user with a unique email and a password that meets security standards, returning a JWT token and user details.

title: user login with valid credentials
description: Test the user login API to verify that a user can authenticate with valid email and password, receiving a JWT token and user details upon successful login.

title: get recommended events with authentication
description: Test the get recommended events API to ensure it returns a list of events filtered by user interests and sorted by date/time, only accessible with valid JWT authentication.

title: create event with admin authorization
description: Test the create event API to verify that only authenticated admin users can create new events with required fields such as title, date, time, location, and tags.

title: get wellness tip based on mood with authentication
description: Test the wellness tip API to ensure it returns an appropriate wellness tip based on the user's mood parameter, accessible only with valid JWT authentication.

title: record wellness checkin and award points
description: Test the wellness check-in API to verify that it records the user's mood and tip, updates the user's points accordingly, and requires valid JWT authentication.

title: get top three study buddy matches with authentication
description: Test the study buddy matching API to ensure it returns the top 3 compatible study partners based on shared skills and interests, accessible only with valid JWT authentication.
